content: I'll follow up with Jack about building relationships with industry professionals and ask for some specific advice on how to do that. "Hey Jack, thanks for the tips on applying for a photo pass and accessing restricted areas at Coachella. You mentioned building relationships with industry professionals, like festival organizers, publicists, and artist teams. Can you give me some specific advice on how to do that? Are there any particular events or conferences that I should attend to meet people in the industry?"
